comment: Smart Data Models - UnderexcLimIEEE1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/UnderexcLimIEEE1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents the Type UEL1 model which has a circular limit boundary when plotted in terms of machine reactive power vs. real power output.  Reference: IEEE UEL1 421.5-2005 Section 10.1.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kuc
contents.comment: UEL center setting (K).  Typical Value = 1.38. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kuf
contents.comment: UEL excitation system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 3.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kui
contents.comment: UEL integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kul
contents.comment: UEL proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kur
contents.comment: UEL radius setting (K).  Typical Value = 1.95. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tu1
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tu2
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tu3
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tu4
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vucmax
contents.comment: UEL maximum limit for operating point phasor magnitude (V).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vuimax
contents.comment: UEL integrator output maximum limit (V). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vuimin
contents.comment: UEL integrator output minimum limit (V). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vulmax
contents.comment: UEL output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vulmin
contents.comment: UEL output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = -18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vurmax
contents.comment: UEL maximum limit for radius phasor magnitude (V).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
